body: One Hour Translation - The World's Largest online translation agency is Hiring!You are invited to join our fast growing team of employees!Required skills- Perfect control of proper English (reading, writing and speaking) with no spelling or grammar errors - Mandatory requirement!- Experience living in English speaking country - advantage.- Basic technological knowledge (Office, Internet etc.)- Control of other languages besides English and Romanian - an advantage.- Customer Support experience - an advantage.- Academic degreeWe are looking for people who are smart, highly motivated, reliable, trustworthy, service oriented, and are nice to work with.Position description- Provide customer support by email and phone.- Doing inside (phone/email based) Sales is an option for those with sales experienceTerms- Work is in shifts in our new Bucharest office. - Shifts run 24x7 including on weekends,- This is a full time position, 9 hours a day, 5 days a week.- Above average base salary. (350 EURO Salary + 70 EURO for Taxes + 7 EURO/day for lunch)- Bonuses and other benefits.**The Sales position is like customer support but requires some sales experience (1 year minimum).
